net.sourceforge.aglets.examples.patterns
Class GeneralDialog

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Dialog
                  net.sourceforge.aglets.examples.patterns.GeneralDialog
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
Direct Known Subclasses:
MessageDialog
public abstract class GeneralDialog
extends java.awt.Dialog

The GeneralDialog class is a common and generic dialog to display the messages.

Version:
1.00 96/07/16
Author:
M.Oshima
